and i found out that i used x11vnc: x11vnc is for connecting to a real X server.
If you don't need this use something else (vnc4server or similar)
what is a real X server ?
I want to access my VPS through gui
An X server runs on the machine where a display, keyboard and mouse is attached to.
When you want to connect to such a (client) machine use x11vnc
no i want to connect to a sever
For "emulating" an X server your programs send data to use vncserver
and connect to it via vnc
can I still use "vnc4server" for that?
Yes. You need to run something like vnc4server on  the server. Then you can connect from windows -- please use ssh tunnel -- and run programs on the server that depend on a running X server.
ok ill try it out. thanks+
